articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Taegwan Glass Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Taegwan Glass Factory
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the Taegwan Glass Factory.
					 He learned in detail about the performance of the optical measuring instruments being produced by the factory.
					
					 It further improved the performance of the instruments than last year and ensured their safety, he said, adding that in order to make the instruments produced at the factory prove effective in reality, it is necessary to further raise their precision.
					
					 The inquiry into the performance of the instruments today proved that it is quite possible to succeed if endeavors are made, based on scientific researches and technological updating, he noted.
					
					 He looked round the assembling shop to acquaint himself with production there and quality of products.
					
					 He said that the optical measuring instruments being produced at the factory require high technology, stressing that in order to keep the production going at a high rate and improve their quality it is necessary to give full play to the mental power of the producers, intensify scientific researches and steadily raise the level of technical skills of the workers.
					
					 He underlined the need to focus efforts on the independent technological development capable of surpassing the world level, put the production processes on a modern and automatic basis and wage a more dynamic drive to raise the rate of locally available equipment and materials.
					
					 He also underscored the need to raise high demands to the units producing items of cooperative production and successfully conduct cooperative operations.
					
					 He watched CNC-based machines at work in the assembling shop to learn about the operation of the equipment.
					
					 He set forth tasks which would serve as guidelines for the management and operation of the factory and production.
					
					 He had a photo session with the workers of the factory, expressing expectation and belief that they would boost the production of quality and modern glass products and optical instruments by conducting a widespread mass technological innovation movement, true to the WPK's idea of pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Hwi, Pak Thae Song, Hong Yong Chil and Ri Man Gon, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Appeal to All Koreans Issued
articles.content:
Appeal to All Koreans Issued 
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The north, the south and overseas sides committees for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration Friday released an appeal to all Koreans at home and abroad on Friday, a day before the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					 The appeal said:
					
					 The publication of the June 15 joint declaration marked a great event of particular importance in the history of the nation as it put an end to the history of distrust and confrontation which lasted for over half a century and ushered in a new era of national reconciliation, unity, reunification, peace and prosperity. 
					
					 The severed ties of the nation and cut railways and roads were rejoined and people from all walks of life in the north and the south visited each other thanks to the broad way paved by the June 15 era, sharing compatriotic love. They held great festivals for reunification, proudly declaring "Korea is one" before the whole world 
					
					 But, the last five years have witnessed the inter-Korean ties worsen due to the denial of the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and escalating military tension and confrontation. The tour of Mt. Kumgang resort, a symbol of the June 15 era, was suspended and the Kaesong Industrial Zone was put in the danger of closure. 
					
					 A wide avenue will be paved for peace, reunification and prosperity when the June 15 joint declaration, a programme and landmark for reunification common to the nation, is upheld and implemented but denial of the spirit of the June 15 era is bound to bring back the Cold War era of distrust and confrontation. This is a bitter lesson the nation learned from the last five years and the present situation. 
					
					 The appeal went on:
					
					 Let us set store by the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and thoroughly implement them!
					
					 Let all Koreans support all the activities for implementing the north-south joint declaration and dynamically turn out in the actions to implement them!
					
					 Let us independently settle the issue of the country's reunification by concerted efforts of the Koreans!
					
					Let all Koreans at home and abroad vigorously turn out in the nationwide movement for peace against war!
					
					 Let all Koreans pool efforts to defuse the tension on this land and build a lasting peace-keeping mechanism!
					
					 Let us pool our will and intention for the peace and reunification of the country irrespective of party affiliation, ism and officials and people!
					
					 Let us launch a widespread solidarity movement for implementing the north-south joint declaration and cement the great unity of the nation by resuming visits and contacts of people of all social standings and diverse meetings for reunification!
					
					 Let all organizations and individuals at home and abroad who support the June 15 joint declaration and desire the  reunification of the country join in the activities of All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration!
					
					 Let us raise a hot wind of June 15 once again to usher in the second June 15 era of reunification!

articles.title: Senior Officials Visit Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory
articles.content:
Senior Officials Visit Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Senior state officials including Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, and officials of the working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory.
					 The factory has turned into a modern essential foodstuff production base all the production processes of which have been automatized ranging from feeding of raw material to packing, a factory which has established a high level of cultured practice in production and life. 
					
					 The visitors laid bunches of flowers before a mosaic depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the factory and made bows to them.
					
					 They looked round various places of the factory along the course of field guidance to the factory by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who expressed great satisfaction with the factory, highly estimating it as one where the line of the three revolutions, ideological, technical and cultural, has been embodied.
					
					 They watched a video, being briefed on the founding of the factory and its development, leadership feats performed by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and the history of the development of the factory at the room dedicated to its history.
					
					 They looked round the nursery, the house of culture, canteen, public bath, swimming pool, beauty parlor, E-library and scientific and technological library. 
					
					 Seeing the production processes whose automation and robotization have been placed on a high level including the general control room, refined table oil, seasoning, refined salt and vitamin E and their packing processes, they deeply grasped the patriotic intention of Kim Jong Un on accelerating the modernization of the factory by the DPRK's efforts and technology.

articles.title: Pyongyang Mass Rally Held
articles.content:
Pyongyang Mass Rally Held 
Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang mass rally took place at Kim Il Sung Square to vow to devotedly carry out the important tasks set forth at the historic appeal sent by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un and respond to the letter to the people across the country sent by those reclaiming the Sepho tableland. 
					 Present at the rally were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Mun Kyong Dok and others, officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials of the party and administration bodies, institutions, factories and enterprises at different levels and farms and other people, students and teachers of universities and colleges, more than 100,000 in all. 
					
					 The appeal of Kim Jong Un was read out by Mun Kyong Dok, alternative member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK. 
					
					 A letter to the people across the country sent by those reclaiming the Sepho tableland was read out.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The speakers said that the historic appeal of Kim Jong Un reflects his intention to provide as early as possible the Korean people with a happy life with no more to desire in the world.
					
					 Those reclaiming the Sepho tableland called on all working people across the country to demonstrate before the world the might of the single-minded unity of Songun Korea where once the party makes lightning, it is responded with thunder, the speakers noted.  
					
					  They underscored the need to bring about a great leap forward and signal innovations in iron and steel production and carry out the tasks for agricultural production this year without fail.
					
					 They said they would boost the production of essential food by learning from the work style of the service personnel of the People's Army who are creating the "Masikryong Speed", keeping deep in their mind the instructions given by Kim Jong Un to realize the desires of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il without fail.
					
					 They vowed to usher in a new heyday on all fronts for socialist construction at the "Masikryong Speed" in hearty response to the letter of those reclaiming the Sepho tableland, holding high the historic appeal of Kim Jong Un as the banner of the country's prosperity, and thus glorify this significant year marking the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War with shining labor achievements.

articles.title: "Arirang" to Be Given in Pyongyang
articles.content:
"Arirang" to Be Given in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, will be given here to mark the 60th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War and the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 All the service personnel and people in the country are making great efforts to create "Masikryong Speed", true to the militant call of the Party Central Committee and ushering in great prosperity of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's era. Amid this high-pitched atmosphere, the grand performance will show again the might of the single-minded unity of Juche Korea and the developed appearances of the culture and art of Songun.
					
					 The performance will give impressive depiction of the undying feats President Kim Il Sung performed in winning the victory in the war and the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The performance will strikingly demonstrate the fixed will and militant spirit of the army and people of the DPRK to glorify the revolutionary feats the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in defending the country and achieving prosperity, dynamically advance toward the path of independence, Songun and socialism under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un and win a final victory without fail. 
					
					 The performance will be held at May Day Stadium from July 22.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing 
 Beijing, June 13 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Thursday to mark the 30th anniversary of the historic maiden visit to China made by leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 Among those present there on invitation were Li Yuanchao, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of China and vice-president of China; Liu Jieyi, deputy head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., CPC; Liu Zhenmin, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs; and other officials. 
					
					 Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China, and staff members of his embassy, were present there.
					
					 Ji Jae Ryong said in his speech that the maiden visit to China by Kim Jong Il was a historic event which greatly contributed to putting on a new high stage the traditional DPRK-China friendship which was provided and cultivated by President Kim Il Sung together with Mao Zedong and Zhou Enlai and other leaders of the elder generation of China and stood all tests of history and to ensuring the peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world and advancing the human cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 He noted that the dear respected Kim Jong Un is paying deep attention to boosting the DPRK-China friendly relations true to the noble intention of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We will as ever make joint efforts with Chinese comrades to steadily boost the traditional DPRK-China friendship, he added.
					
					 Li Yuanchao said in his speech that Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to develop the Korean revolution and construction and the traditional Sino-DPRK friendly relations and made important contributions.
					
					 First Secretary Kim Jong Un in his recent personal letter sent to General Secretary Xi Jinping underlined the need to carry forward and develop the traditional Sino-DPRK friendly relations, Li Yuanchao noted.
					
					 The Chinese party and government set great store by the Sino-DPRK friendly relations and the new collective leadership of the Communist Party of China will together with the party and government of the DPRK respect and trust each other and conduct friendly exchange and cooperation in the spirit of inheriting the tradition, facing up to the future, building good-neighborly friendship and strengthening cooperation and thus promote the development of the Sino-DPRK friendly relations and defend the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula, Li Yuanchao stressed.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Central Committee Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Central Committee Marked
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the women's union held a poem recitation meeting "Let Us Uphold Our Mother Party Forever" at the Hall of Women on Friday to celebrate the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there were Ri Yong Su, department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Ro Song Sil, chairwoman of the C.C., the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, officials concerned, officials of the women's union and its members in Pyongyang.
					
					 The repertoire included quadruple poem recital "People Sing of June" praising the immortal feats of Kim Jong Il, who developed the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung since he started his work at the staff of the revolution and story-telling and solo poem recital "Mother" reflecting the boundless trust of all the service personnel and people in the party.
					
					 Also recited there were poems deeply depicting the immortal revolutionary feats of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, who is glorifying the great WPK, Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea before the world, true to the noble intention and desire of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The meeting showed the firm will of the women across the country to vigorously advance in the spirit of "Masikryong Speed" in hearty response to the historic appeal sent by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Chief of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Interviewed
articles.content:
Chief of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Interviewed
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, was interviewed by KCNA on Friday, a day before the 13th anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration. 
					 He said that the publication of the joint declaration serves as a great event that ushered in a new era of independent reunification, national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 He added:
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration was the fruition of the great wisdom and efforts of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Different places of south Korea greeting the 13th anniversary of the joint declaration are pervaded with longing for Kim Jong Il, who ushered in a heyday of national reconciliation and unity.
					
					The feats Kim Jong Il performed by providing the great programme for independent reunification and opening a bright prospect of national prosperity will always go down in history.
					
					 The chief of the mission accused the south Korean authorities of rejecting the proposal for holding an event common to the nation marking the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and made the hard-won talks between the authorities of the north and the south of Korea abortive.
					
					  It is the unanimous will and desire of all the Koreans to bring the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula under control and to usher in a new phase of independent reunification under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Whoever desires reunification should respect the joint declaration and opt for sincerely implementing it.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un is leading the movement for the country's reunification. 
					
					 All Koreans are convinced of the future of thriving Korea while looking up to his sacred image.
					
					 The country's reunification is sure to be achieved as the Koreans hold Kim Jong Un, a peerlessly great man, in high esteem.
					
					 The vanguard fighters and patriotic people of south Korea will carry on their dynamic actions to achieve the national reconciliation, unity and reunification.

articles.title: Sports Family
articles.content:
Sports Family
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- There is a sports family in Sinuiju City, North Phyongan Province, the DPRK.
					 Kim Kwang Ho is the chief coach of the women's basketball team of the Sinuiju Chemical Fibre Mill and Kang Yon Suk, his wife, is the chief coach of acrobatic gymnastics in the Taeryonggang Sports Team.
					
					 Kim started his career as a basketball player in the Taeryonggang Sports Team. After he retired, he, as chief coach, has led his team to win seven women's basketball titles at the Sports Contest for Songun Torch Prize.
					
					 Kang was an acrobatic gymnast at the April 25 Sports Team. She has served as chief coach at the Taeryonggang Sports Team for scores of years.
					
					 Gymnasts trained by her proved successful at international tournaments, including the Asian Gymnastics Championship and clinched more than 500 medals in local tournaments.
					
					 Among the athletes this couple has trained are a number of sports aces, including merited sportspersons.
					
					 Their son and daughter are football and basketball players respectively.

articles.title: Blood Donors on Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Blood Donors on Increase in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The number of blood donors is on increase in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The government awards orders to periodic blood donors and speaks highly of those who volunteer to donate blood for patients.
					
					 It also pays attention to encouraging young people to donate blood.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Ministry of Public Health has set it as a principle to preferentially supply materials for blood provision and regularly organized workshops for health workers in blood field.
					
					 In recent years, the government has invested a large amount of money in updating the National Blood Center under the Ministry of Public Health and provincial blood centers.
					
					 Events to mark World Blood Donor Day (June 14) are held annually throughout the country in a way to increase voluntary unpaid blood donors.
					
					 Colorful events took place on Thursday to mark the day under the theme of "Blood Donation Is a Gift of Life".
					
					 The events included introduction of active blood donors, photo exhibition, and art performance.
					
					 The work for blood donation in the country is going on in close cooperation with the World Health Organization and other international agencies.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams S. Korea for Making North, South Talks Abortive
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams S. Korea for Making North, South Talks Abortive
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are working hard to pass the buck for the breakdown of the talks between the authorities of the north and the south of Korea to the DPRK, says Minju Joson Friday in a bylined commentary.
					 Noting that this reminds one of a thief crying "stop the thief", the commentary goes on:
					
					  Words like "the method of forcing subordination and humiliation is not desirable" are what the DPRK should say to the south side.
					
					 The south side at the working contact for the talks between authorities of the north and the south impudently designated a certain person, calling his name and demanding that he should appear at the talks as the head of delegation from the north side. They even made assertion of interfering in the internal affairs of the DPRK, an insult and provocation seriously getting on its nerves and forcing it into submission.
					
					 The puppet forces suggested the vice-minister of Unification as chief delegate. Their calculation was that if the north side accepts the suggestion, they would raise the issues of "nuclear dismantlement" and the admission of warship sinking incident and thus turn the talks into the theater for escalating the confrontation with compatriots and if the north side opposes the change of the chief delegate, they would pass the buck for the breakdown of the talks to the DPRK.
					
					 As clearly proved by the fact, the puppet forces are wholly to blame for the breakdown of the talks.
					
					 They can not evade the crimes of making the talks abortive to the disappointment of all the Koreans and pushing south Korean businessmen and other people who are waiting for a helping hand to death and distress.

articles.title: KCNA Accuses S. Korea of Making Inter-Korean Talks Abortive
articles.content:
KCNA Accuses S. Korea of Making Inter-Korean Talks Abortive
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The talks between authorities of the north and the south proved abortive due to the sinister intention of the south Korean authorities to use them for their ulterior purpose from the beginning. 
					 All Koreans warmly welcomed and supported the publication of the special statement of the spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea as a bold decision to defuse the worst confrontation between the north and the south. 
					
					 They ardently wished to see the north-south ties improved and a new phase opened for reunification, nostalgic for the June 15 era when a warm atmosphere of national reunification prevailed. 
					
					 But, the south Korean puppet authorities did not wish to hold dialogue from the start but were displeased with the improvement of the inter-Korean ties by concerted efforts of Koreans. 
					
					 No sooner had the special statement was issued than the south side let loose rhetoric that "north's intention was not clear," terming it "the north's attempt to escape isolation caused by a campaign to boost cooperation in putting pressure upon it " in the light of the time it was announced.
					
					 As regards the agenda of the talks, the south side tried hard not to include in it the issue of jointly marking the June 15 and July 4 anniversaries and the issue of promoting non-governmental visits, contacts and cooperation projects. When discussing the issues of normalizing the operations in the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) and resuming the tour of Mt. Kumgang resort, the south side tried to delete the expression "normalization" and "resumption" in a bid to make wordings ambiguous. 
					
					 The south side claimed "the north proposed issues of KIZ, tour of Mt. Kumgang resort, reunion of separated families, joint events for marking June 15 at once like rice with assorted mixtures." 
					
					 It went on: "If the south rejects these proposals the international community will hold it accountable for them. And if it responds to them without correct calculation, it will spark domestic outcry. The south should, therefore, be careful about the north's intention lurking behind the proposed dialogue." All this was a spate of invectives let loose by the south side.
					
					 In short, this was the stand and attitude of the south side towards the talks and an ulterior aim sought by it. 
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that such political charlatans cannot accomplish anything, to say nothing of the great cause of the nation, as they had been compelled to come to the negotiating table for fear of domestic and foreign criticism out of their ulterior motive. 
					
					 Although the south side's stand and attitude were ambiguous from the very outset, the north side made every sincere effort to make the talks for the great cause of the nation successful. 
					
					 When the north side was bold enough to manifest generosity as regards the talks, the south side insisted on its far-fetched assertion at the working contact. After officially agreeing on inter-Korean authorities' talks, it made such reckless remarks behind the scene as "Don't pin any hope" and "Don't be too hasty." 
					
					 The south side made such remarks as the head of the north side's delegation is "an official hardly recognizable", it was "abnormal practice" and that it was beyond the common sense and international standard." 
					
					 All these facts go to prove that the south side had neither will for dialogue from the beginning nor an intention to settle any issues after being compelled to appear at the talks; its preoccupation was to torpedo the talks at any cost after throwing hurdles in the way of talks under unreasonable pretexts. 
					
					 The south side thus prevented the talks arranged with so much effort from taking place, quelling the ardent desire of the nation to jointly mark the June 15 anniversary as an event for national reunification. 
					
					 The south side clearly revealed before all Koreans and international community that it has not an iota of sincerity to improve the north-south relations.

articles.title: Indiscriminate Investigation into Human Rights Activist under Fire
articles.content:
Indiscriminate Investigation into Human Rights Activist under Fire
 Pyongyang, Jun 14 (KCNA) -- Civic organizations in south Korea including the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy and the People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "Security Law" held a press conference outside the "Human Rights Committee" on June 11 in protest against the suppression of a human rights activist.
					 Speeches were made at the conference.
					
					 Kwon O Hon, honorary chairman of the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, said So Su Yong, a human rights activist is still subject to a police investigation after his house was forcibly searched on charges of violation of the "Security Law" in April last for the mere reason that he conducted activities for the release and support to the prisoners of conscience and national reunification for years.
					
					 They accused police of making an indiscriminate investigation into his family, adding:  This crackdown should be stopped at once as it is suppressing the freedom of expression and encroaching upon human rights.
					
					 They demanded the "Human Rights Committee" make a thorough investigation into the case, punish those concerned and take a step against the reoccurrence of the case.
					
					 Pak Rae Gun, executive chairman of the People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "Security Law", noted that what the UN Human Rights Committee noted, to begin with, after examining the human rights performance in south Korea was the problem of the "Security Law" and clarified next the "Human Rights Committee" of south Korea lost its function.
					
					 He noted that the human rights issue of south Korea has been put on a chopping board. 
					
					 Then a press release was read out.
					
					  It demanded the Kyonggi Local Police Agency and the South Kyongsang Provincial Branch of the Intelligence Service stop at once the investigation into So Su Yong and human rights abuses against him.

articles.title: Implementation of North-South Joint Declaration Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of North-South Joint Declaration Called for
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Civilians and students in Taejon City, south Korea held a "marathon for unification" on June 8 on the occasion of the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 They said that the event marking the anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration helps recollect the spirit of the joint declaration.
					
					 They called on all people to take an active part in the actions for implementing the joint declaration, bearing it deep in mind.
					
					 They underscored the need to put an end to sufferings resulting from national division and hand down the peaceful and reunified country to posterity as early as possible.
					
					 On the same day the Ansan Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a "walking for unification." 
					
					 Noting that this year marks the 60th anniversary of the conclusion of the Armistice Agreement, the participants called on the people to become vocal demanding the defusing of the danger of war growing on the Korean Peninsula and conclusion of a peace treaty.

articles.title: Joint National Events Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Joint National Events Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference at the puppet National Assembly building on June 11 together with opposition parties demanding the authorities allow joint national events.
					 At the conference speakers accused the authorities of getting vocal about the "fomentation of contradictions among southerners" and "dual character" and obstructing the joint national events for marking the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration proposed by the north.
					
					 They urged the present regime to ensure the joint national events and contribute to improving the south-north relations.
					
					 In order to successfully hold the events it is necessary for all the people to pool their efforts, they stressed.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Slammed for Calling Off North, South Talks
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Slammed for Calling Off North, South Talks
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification released an urgent statement on June 11 denouncing the puppet group for deliberately canceling the talks between the authorities of the north and the south.
					 All fellow countrymen were greatly shocked and disappointed by the news of the breakdown of the talks, the statement said.
					
					 At the working contact the south side dragged on the negotiating session for nearly 16 hours over the issues of agenda of the talks and the "level" of the heads of the delegations, it noted.
					
					 It accused the authorities of the south side of insisting that the delegation of the north side should be headed by a secretary of the Party Central Committee even though they proposed the ministerial-level talks.
					
					 It noted that the present chief executive of south Korea said as if the issue of "level" is a precondition for the talks.
					
					 It went on: The present regime informed right before the opening of the talks that it would send the vice-minister of Unification as the chief delegate of the south side, an open revelation of its attempt to deliberately torpedo the talks, contrary to the demand of the nation.
					
					 In view of the previous talks, the recently-proposed talks should have been headed by the minister of Unification from the south side and by either the chief councilor of the Cabinet or the director of the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea from the north side.
					
					 However, the authorities of the south side, described the past achievements as "abnormal practices", while talking about "principle" and "trust" in the south-north ties, and pledged to set a new principle. This is little short of denying the south-north joint declarations.
					
					 If the deeds of the authorities of the south side do not match with their words, the south-north relations will again plunge into confrontation and state of war.
					
					 The statement demanded the "government" successfully hold the talks between the authorities of the north and the south at any cost, bearing in mind that the principle and trust of the south-north relations start from the implementation of the joint declarations.

articles.title: S. Korean "Government" Urged to Opt for Improving Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
S. Korean "Government" Urged to Opt for Improving Inter-Korean Relations
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea issued an urgent statement on Tuesday condemning the puppet group for making the talks between the authorities of the north and the south abortive.
					 Surprise south-north dialogue proved abortive due to the thoughtless attitude of the present "government", the statement charged.
					
					 The south and the north were recently wrapped in an atmosphere of dialogue following the north's proposal for dialogue, a result of a measure taken by the north out of concession, it said, and went on:
					
					 However, the Park Geun Hye's "government" raised the inscrutable issue of "level", barring the north from sending its delegation.
					
					 The present "government" showed the inscrutable attitude at the working contact.
					
					 It should bear responsibility for the situation, back down on the unreasonable demand at an early date and work hard for the opening of the talks between the authorities of the north and the south.
					
					 The present-day's phase of dialogue requires utmost discretion based on mutual respect and recognition.
					
					 The "government" should work hard to make sure that the talks be opened and held with success.
					
					 It should realize that if it evades the blame and scuttle the talks, it will have to stand trial by the people.
					
					 We demand the "government" opt for mending the south-north ties.
					
					 The "government" should bring the situation under control and take another step for holding a south-north dialogue.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted on Swiss Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted on Swiss Website
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea posted President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Fight on Staunchly for the Liberation of the Fatherland" on its website on June 4.
					 The work, published on June 4, Juche 26 (1937), discloses the fascist suppression and barbarous plunder by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks for achieving the cause of national liberation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report Posted on German Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report Posted on German Website
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The historic report and conclusion made by the  dear respected Kim Jong Un at the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea were posted on the website of a publishing house of Germany on June 8.
					 The report set forth a new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force as required by the prevailing situation and the development of the Korean revolution, and tasks and ways for realizing it.
					
					 The website carried his photo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Benin, Poland and Sweden in the period from June 6 to 8 to mark the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were figures of the Socialist Party of Benin, Polish Communist Party, Poland-Korea Association, Communist Party of Sweden, Sweden-Korea Friendship Association and the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and other people.
					
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, in his speech said Kim Jong Il indicated that the WPK is the eternal Party of President Kim Il Sung and made sure that the tradition of unity and cohesion is being carried forward.
					
					 Jacech Poniewierski, first vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association, said that Kim Jong Il carried forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and strengthened the WPK and turned socialist Korea into a political and military power.
					
					 He stressed that the history of modern Korea is unthinkable apart from Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, praised the immortal Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings in Benin and Poland.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Peru
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Peru
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute issued a joint statement on June 7 to mark the 49th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement noted as follows:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., WPK on June 19, 1964 was a historic event of great significance in strengthening the WPK and accomplishing the world socialist cause.
					
					 He developed in depth the Juche idea and the cause of President Kim Il Sung and provided the firm base for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche through decades of outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and Songun leadership.
					
					 He authored "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung", "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party", "Socialism Is a Science" and other classic works and thus maintained the revolutionary nature of the WPK and defended the destiny of socialism.
					
					 He victoriously advanced the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence with his unique Songun politics.
					
					 The WPK will continue to develop into a guiding force leading the revolution and construction to victory as it is led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK who is successfully carrying forward President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's cause of Juche and Songun.

articles.title: Anniversary of North-South Declaration Marked in Various Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of North-South Declaration Marked in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Sweden and Democratic Congo and round-table talks in Ethiopia on June 6 and 8 on the occasion of the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Present there were personages of the Communist Party of Sweden, the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Association for Implementing the Juche Philosophy of Democratic Congo, the Design and Control Office of Water Projects in Ethiopia and other people.
					
					 The chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association in his speech said that the north-south joint declaration is a landmark for Korea's reunification which reflected the nation's desire for independence, reunification and peace.
					
					 The chairman of the Association for Implementing the Juche Philosophy of Democratic Congo stressed that Korea still remains divided due to the U.S. and south Korean authorities following it.
					
					 We will support the Korean people in their struggle to realize the country's reunification by their own efforts free from foreign forces' interference and raise voices calling for the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea, the chairman noted.
					
					 The director of the Construction and Management Department of the Design and Control Office of Water Projects in Ethiopia expressed belief that the Korean people would certainly achieve the country's reunification under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, referring to the validity and vitality of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.

articles.title: June 15 Joint Declaration Supported in Ecuador, Britain
articles.content:
June 15 Joint Declaration Supported in Ecuador, Britain
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Ecuador and Britain issued statements to mark the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification stated as follows on June 6:
					
					 The adoption of the June 15 joint declaration was a successful fruition of the noble idea of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il of loving the country and nation.
					
					 Korea's reunification should be independently realized by the efforts of the nation itself without fail, free from foreign forces' interference.
					
					 The Korean people will surely achieve the independent reunification of the country under the wise leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un by smashing every move of the anti-reunification forces.
					
					 We send full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle.
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement said as follows on June 8:
					
					 The publication of the June 15 joint declaration made a breakthrough in the barrier of the division of the Korean nation enforced by the U.S. imperialists, an important event unknown in the history of the division.
					
					 The publication of the joint declaration is the result of the energetic leadership and Songun politics of leader Kim Jong Il who made tireless efforts for the country's reunification, true to the idea of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces and other forces following the U.S. are denying the fundamental principles of the June 15 joint declaration but the Korean people will certainly realize the independent and peaceful reunification of the country in the idea of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: West Sea Barrage Introduced by Nepali Newspaper
articles.content:
West Sea Barrage Introduced by Nepali Newspaper
 Pyongyang, June 14 (KCNA) -- The June 7th issue of the Nepali newspaper Arpan carried an article titled "The West Sea Barrage" with a photo of President Kim Il Sung standing together with leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The newspaper noted that the West Sea Barrage built in a wild sea is associated with the exploits of Kim Jong Il, who realized the world-level grand nature-remaking plan of the President. The article went on:
					
					 The President fixed the location of the barrage, getting the first-hand look of it with technicians aboard a ship on May 22, 1981.
					
					 Kim Jong Il entrusted the People's Army with the task of building the barrage, thinking that the barrage construction is possible as there are firm foundation of the self-supporting national economy and the service personnel of the People's Army boundlessly loyal to the party.
					
					 Noting that the inaugural ceremony of the barrage was successfully held on June 24, 1986, the newspaper stressed that the completion of the barrage resulted in the irrigation of the vast arable land on the west coast and hundreds of thousands of hectares of tideland to be reclaimed in the future by water of the artificial sea and the successful solution of the matter of industrial water in the basin of the Taedong River.
					
					 It introduced in detail the fact that the traffic transport of the country and the people's living could further develop and improve and the country take on more beautiful look through the creation of a long canal and a big beltway.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige el distrito de Changsong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige el distrito de Changsong
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio el dia 13 en el terreno las gestiones de diversas ramas del distrito de Changsong de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.
					Estuvo primero en la modernizada Fabrica de Alimentos de Changsong.
					
					Recorrio el monumento a la direccion en el terreno del Presidente Kim Il Sung y la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					En los talleres de los equipos de trabajo de molienda y de produccion de licor, confites y de elaboracion de frutas silvestres, la sala de exhibicion de muestras y otros puntos, averiguo como se cumplen las instrucciones del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Los empleados de la fabrica y los funcionarios de ramas correspondientes acondicionaron esta unidad como base especializada en la elaboracion de frutas silvestres y lograron notables exitos en la materializacion de las instrucciones del Dirigente de que ella debe ser campeona en esa labor, evaluo.
					
					Sin vanagloriarse de los exitos alcanzados, deben impulsar con mas energia la reconstruccion tecnica, mejorar sin parar el nivel tecnico de los empleados y organizar con esmero la administracion empresarial, dijo.
					
					Expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que los empleados levantaran la ola de aumento de produccion teniendo presente el noble amor por el pueblo de los Generalisimos, tomo con ellos una foto de recuerdo.
					
					En el Restaurante de Changsong y el Comedor de Fideo de Changsong, el Mariscal pregunto cuantos caben en ellos y como se suministran las materias primas de cocina.
					
					Para desarrollar mas la cultura culinaria conforme a la demanda de nuevo siglo, deben fomentar mas el festival de platos, subrayo.
					
					Se retrato con los empleados de dos restaurantes manifestando la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos mejoraran los servicios trabajando con la disposicion de servir con abnegacion al pueblo.
					
					Recorriendo Undokwon (casa de servicios publicos), subrayo la necesidad de remodelarla mejor diciendo que no puede haber complacencia en los trabajos para el pueblo.
					
					Al contemplar la cabeza distrital nuevamente construida con motivo del 50o aniversario de la Conferencia Conjunta de Changsong, evaluo que ella ha sido acondicionada bien conforme a sus caracteristicas de zona montanosa.
					
					Recalco que el distrito es base importante del cumplimiento de tres revoluciones y zona de combate en defensa del regimen socialista y agrego que hay que elevar el papel del distrito conforme a la demanda de la epoca del Songun.
					
					Enseno que debe desarrollar la economia local para defender la idea y las hazanas del Presidente y el Dirigente y resolver el problema de la vida del pueblo.
					
					Seguidamente, se dirigio al Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria de Changsong.
					
					Tras escuchar explicaciones ante el monumento a las actividades historico-revolucionarias que transmite las imborrables huellas dejadas en Changsong por los Generalisimos y por Kim Hyong Jik, destacado dirigente del movimiento antijapones de liberacion nacional de Corea, entro en el museo donde instruyo acondicionar el distrito como paraiso del pueblo en que repercutan las vivas del socialismo.
					
					Se fotografio luego con los empleados del museo.
					
					Recorrio a continuacion el lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Changgol.
					
					Este lugar tiene mucho significado en la historia del PTC, dijo y anadio que hay que conservarlo eternamente para educar a los militantes del partido, trabajadores, militares, jovenes y ninos escolares en las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias y las nobles virtudes del Presidente quien condujo a la victoria la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					E impartio la tarea de crear una obra de bellas artes sobre el Presidente trabajando en ese lugar historico.
					
					En la Casa Cultural de Changsong, el Mariscal disfruto la funcion del grupo artistico del distrito.
					
					Evaluo altamente el hecho de que los miembros del grupo ofrecieron esa funcion magnifica de gran valor educativo que refleja verazmente la vida de si mismos.
					
					Finalmente, se retrato con los miembros del grupo artistico.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Hwi, Pak Thae Song y el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Ri Man Gon.

articles.title: Emitido llamamiento a toda la nacion coreana
articles.content:
Emitido llamamiento a toda la nacion coreana
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 13o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur de Corea del 15 de Junio, los comites norteno, sureno y ultramarino para la ejecucion de la misma emitieron hoy un llamamiento a todos los coreanos en el interior y exterior del pais. 
					La publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio fue un acontecimiento especial en la historia nacional, que puso punto final a la historia de desconfianza y confrontacion perdurada mas de medio siglo y abrio la nueva era de reconciliacion y unidad nacionales, la reunificacion, paz y prosperidad, senala la nota y continua: 
					
					Gracias al evento, amplias masas del Norte y el Sur reanudaron los lazos sanguineos y terrestres de la nacion, compartieron el sentimiento fraternal en visitas reciprocas, realizaron el gran festival de reunificacion acaparando la atencion de todo el mundo y declararon orgullosamente que Corea es una sola. 
					
					Pero, durante el lustro pasado, fue negado el espiritu de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y se agravaron la tension militar y la confrontacion, debido a lo cual quedaron deterioradas cada dia mas las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Como resultado, fue suspendido el turismo al monte Kumgang y cayo en la crisis de cierre hasta la Zona Industrial de Kaesong. 
					
					Solo cuando defendamos y ejecutemos la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, gran programa y jalon de reunificacion, podemos lograr la paz, la reunificacion y la prosperidad. En el caso contrario, las relaciones intercoreanas retrocederan a la era de guerra fria, la de desconfianza y confrontacion.
					
					Esto es la amarga leccion sacada de los 5 anos pasados y la realidad de hoy. 
					
					!Apreciemos y ejecutemos cabalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre!
					
					!Que toda la nacion apoye todas las actividades para la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur y se levante para implementarla!
					
					!Resolvamos el problema de reunificacion del pais de manera independiente con las fuerzas unidas de nuestra nacion!
					
					!Todos los coreanos dentro y fuera del pais, levantense en el movimiento pannacional contra la guerra y por la paz!
					
					!Unamos las fuerzas de toda la nacion para aliviar la tension militar en este territorio y establecer el sistema de paz duradera!
					
					!Unamos el alma y proposito en aras de la paz y la reunificacion, independientemente de las fracciones, pertenencias, criterios y estatus sociales, sea, autoridades o civiles!
					
					!Activemos el movimiento de solidaridad para ejecutar la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur, reanudemos las visitas y contactos de distintos estratos y consolidemos la gran unidad nacional mediante diversos actos de reunificacion!
					
					!Que todas las entidades y personalidades de distintos estratos en el interior y exterior del pais, partidarias de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y de la reunificacion del pais, se suman a las actividades del Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio!
					
					!Volvamos a levantar la oleada del 15 de Junio y abramos la segunda era de reunificacion del 15 de Junio!

articles.title: Capitalinos juran producir innovaciones en construccion socialista con "velocidad Masikryong"
articles.content:
Capitalinos juran producir innovaciones en construccion socialista con "velocidad Masikryong"
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 14 en la capitalina Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin de los ciudadanos de Pyongyang para jurar el cumplimiento de las tareas importantes presentadas en el historico llamamiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, emitido hace poco, y responder a la carta de los roturadores de la meseta de Sepho.
					 Participaron aqui Kim Yong Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Mun Kyong Dok y otros cuadros, los funcionarios de las entidades de masas, ministerios, organos centrales y de las instituciones del partido y administracion en esta capital y mas de 100 mil habitantes de diferentes estratos como funcionarios y trabajadores de organos, fabricas, empresas y granjas de distintos niveles y los profesores, empleados y estudiantes de las universidades y escuelas politecnicas.
					
					  Mun Kyong Dok, miembro suplente del Buro Politico, secretario del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la ciudad de Pyongyang, dio lectura al llamamiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					  Fue leida igualmente la carta que enviaron los participantes en la roturacion de la meseta de Sepho a los trabajadores de todo el pais.
					
					  Seguidamente, hubo intervenciones.
					
					  Los oradores apuntaron que el historico llamamiento del Mariscal refleja su proposito de hacer al pueblo vivir sin tener nada que envidiar en este mundo.
					
					  Recordaron que los roturadores de Sepho exhortaron a los trabajadores de todo el pais manifestar a todo el mundo el poderio de la unidad monolitica de la Corea del Songun que responde a los llamados del partido con toda fidelidad y entusiasmo.
					
					  Resaltaron la necesidad de producir grandes saltos e innovaciones en la produccion de materiales de acero y de cumplir sin falta las tareas de produccion agricola de este ano.
					
					  Guardando en el profundo de corazon las instrucciones del Mariscal de realizar sin falta los deseos de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, produciremos mas alimentos basicos trabajando con el modo de lucha de los militares del EPC que crean la "velocidad Masikryong", enfatizaron.
					
					  En correspondencia al llamamiento del Mariscal, bandera de prosperidad de la patria, y a la carta de los roturadores de Sepho, abriremos con la "velocidad Masikryong" la nueva era de prosperidad en todos los sectores de la construccion socialista para coronar con exitos laborales este ano significativo en que se cumplen 65 anos de fundacion de la RPDC y 60 anos de victoria del pueblo coreano en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, concluyeron.

articles.title: Se ofrecera funcion gimnastico-artistica masiva "Arirang"
articles.content:
Se ofrecera funcion gimnastico-artistica masiva "Arirang"
Pyongyang, 14 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 60o aniversario del triunfo del pueblo coreano en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y el 65o de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se ofrecera en esta capital la funcion gimnastico-artistica masiva "Arirang", obra laureada con el Premio Kim Il Sung. 
					En estos momentos conmovedores en que en acato al llamamiento combativo del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, todos los militares y civiles del pais libran con dinamismo la campana para crear la "velocidad Masikryong" y escriben una gran era dorada de la epoca de Kim Jong Un, la funcion manifestara, otra vez el poderio de la unidad monolitica de la Corea del Juche y el aspecto de desarrollo de la cultura y arte de la epoca del Songun. 
					
					Y presentara nuevas e impresionantes escenas alusivas a las inmortales hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung acumuladas en el triunfo en la guerra y las otras de la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					
					La funcion demostrara nitidamente la voluntad ferrea y el impetu combativo del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de glorificar las hazanas revolucionarias de los Generalisimos realizadas en la defensa de la patria y la prosperidad del pais, seguir por la senda de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismos bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y lograr sin falta la victoria final. 
					
					La funcion tendra lugar desde el 22 de julio en el Estadio Primero de Mayo.
